message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: https://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/wiki/index.php/OBDALib 

Homepage :
http://obda.inf.unibz.it/protege-plugin/index.html
System
Virtualized (Federated) with Teiid
Materialized
Ontology
DL Lite
Mapping
GLAV
Datasource
implicitly defined from the superclass. No need to define data property mappings.
explicitly defined with additional expression on the same dataset with the superclass datasource.
explicitly defined if different to the superclass datasource. Need to define data property mappings.
Property mapping is treated as first class citizen
unlike R2O, R2RML, D2R
(+) no impedance mismatch. see: Linking Data to Ontologies OWLED2006
(-) property mapping seems redundant (needs to defined again class of domain/range
Query
Source Query : SQL Syntax
Target query : SPARQL
datalog syntax
subset of SPARQL 1.0.
OPTIONAL and FILTER are not supported
Bounded properties only
rdf type property has to be followed with class URI
TBox query, no ABox query (?x rdfs:subClassOf :Person is not valid)
Query Rewriting
PerfectRef
not considering mapping coverage
Query Translation
triple to sql
not considering triple block
Instructions
Download the software here :
http://obda.inf.unibz.it/protege-plugin/download2/download2.html
This seems to work only on Windows, not on Linux
extract the zip file
configure the jdbc on Protege Preferences
Follow the HelloWorld example here :
https://babbage.inf.unibz.it/trac/obdapublic/wiki/SimpleHelloWorldTutorial
HelloWorld sql dump for mysql :
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/531378/ddl/helloworld-mysql.sql
HelloWorld ontology :
https://babbage.inf.unibz.it/trac/obdapublic/raw-attachment/wiki/SimpleHelloWorldTutorial/HelloWorld.owl
MySQL Driver :
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/531378/drivers/mysql-connector-java-5.1.10-bin.jar
speaker: SYSTEM
